assertions.title: The screen reader MUST convey the list role
assertions.rationale: A screen reader user needs to know that content is contained in a list.

assertions.title: The screen reader MUST convey the list boundaries
assertions.rationale: A screen reader user needs to know when they enter and exit a list.

assertions.title: The screen reader MUST convey the number of items in the list
assertions.rationale: A screen reader user needs know how many items are in the list.
